Revolutionizing Retail: O'Neill's Sports's Virtual Shopping Experience

How immersive 360° retail experiences increased customer engagement and online sales for O'Neill's Sports

Project Overview

O'Neill's Sports partnered with 360spaces to create an immersive retail experience that brings their flagship store online. This innovative virtual tour allows customers to browse products, explore different departments, and get a genuine feel for the store atmosphere before visiting in person.

The virtual tour seamlessly integrates with their e-commerce platform, creating a bridge between digital browsing and physical retail that enhances the customer journey at every touchpoint.

The Challenge

O'Neill's Sports needed to compete with online retailers while leveraging their physical store advantage. Traditional product photos and descriptions weren't conveying the quality and variety of their sports equipment and clothing ranges.

They required a solution that would showcase their extensive product displays, create an engaging online experience, and drive more qualified foot traffic to their physical locations.

Our Solution

We created a comprehensive virtual retail experience that highlights O'Neill's Sports's competitive advantages:

  • Interactive product showcases with detailed 360° views
  • Department-by-department navigation mimicking in-store browsing
  • Integration with inventory management for real-time availability
  • Mobile-optimized interface for on-the-go shopping
  • Social sharing features to amplify reach
The virtual tour has become an essential part of our online strategy. Customers can explore our full range before visiting, leading to more qualified visits and higher conversion rates.
Michael O'Neill Director, O'Neill's Sports

Results

200%
Increase in Online Engagement
35%

Customers can explore product ranges and store layouts through our immersive virtual shopping experience, leading to more informed purchasing decisions.
